ðŸ“– Summary: Simba is an open-source Knowledge Management System (KMS) designed for easy integration with RAG systems. It offers a Python SDK, modular architecture, and a user-friendly interface to simplify knowledge management. Simba allows developers to connect their knowledge base to any RAG system, facilitating the creation of advanced AI solutions.
